text: David Lloyd (1 June 1928 – 2000) was an English professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, and was on the books of Sunderland and Sheffield United without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Sportspeople from Gateshead Category:2000 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: David Lloyd (footballer, born 1928)
